S.FORM: John Magufuli 10 bulad 29 demiad, John Magufuli, u misingkiway. 1959 a mihca nalecuhan 2021. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Tanzania ayza sa ci John Magufuli, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 11 bulad 5 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
